name: Kansas_City
text:
Kansas City
Kansas City was a city in Missouri.
History
On May 2, 1986, Dale Cooper and his father passed through Kansas City while on a road trip to San Francisco.
In March 1989, Windom Earle sent a gift-wrapped package containing an article of Caroline Earle's wedding clothes to a law enforcement agency in Kansas City.
Behind the scenes
Kansas City is the largest city in the state of Missouri and is the anchor of the Kansas City metropolitan area, which straddles the Kansas-Missouri border.
There also exists a Kansas City in Kansas, adjacent to and named after the city in Missouri.
